title: 唯色 | “看不见的西藏”获“记者无疆界”公众奖
content:
2012德国之声国际博客大赛在5月2日落幕。

众多网友以Facebook、Twitter等方式投票，使我的博客最终获“记者无疆界”公众奖。

在此，我向所有投票的朋友表示感谢！并向评委表示感谢！尤其感谢评委毛向辉 @isaac 的推荐。

正如德国之声报道：

藏人作家唯色的博客“看不见的西藏”获得网络评选的“记者无疆界”公众奖。在获提名后，唯色曾向德国之声表示，将把“一个人的媒体”坚持下去。评委毛向辉表示，唯色以中文写作，特别能帮助不懂藏语的中国人，去了解以前所不知道的西藏的状况。他也希望更多藏人善用信息工具和新媒体。

正如记者无国界报道：

An additional award was made in the “Reporters Without Borders” category on the basis of votes cast by the public on the BOBs website from 13 March to 2 May. The public’s choice was Invisible Tibet, a blog about the situation in Tibet that Beijing-based writer and poet Tsering Woeser keeps despite the permanent news blackout that the Chinese authorities try to impose on Tibet.

在Facebook上，最早呼吁藏人们为我投票的Jigme Ugen 留言：

Congratulations to Tsering Woeserla for winning the coveted 'Reporters without Borders' Best of Blogs award. They actually had to create an additional award on the basis of votes for 'Invisible Tibet'. 

VERY WELL DESERVED. Woeserla blogs about Tibet from Beijing despite the permanent blackout the Chinese authorities have imposed on information from/about Tibet.  

Thank you to everyone who voted. We pray for her safety and stay inspired by her bravery.

就我而言，我将一如既往，继续“看不见的西藏”，继续“一个人的媒体”。

2012年5月2日
